LCAnomalyLibrary.Defs.EntityCodexEntryDe.label: One Sin
LCAnomalyLibrary.Defs.EntityCodexEntryDe.description: One Sin and Hundreds of Good Deeds (O-03-03), commonly referred to as One Sin, is a relatively harmless Abnormality that is in the shape of a levitating cross\n,seemingly melded with a skull, both of which are bound tightly together by a thorn crown.
